name: blastbtab2bsml
description: convert info stored in btab files into BSML documents

options.description: [REQUIRED] output BSML file containing bit_score information • --btab_dir,-b [REQUIRED] Dir containing btab files • --max_hsp_count,-m Maximum number of HSPs stored per alignment • --class,-c The ref/comp sequence type. Default is 'assembly' • --gzip,-z gzip bsml output • --help,-h This help message
